name(And So, the Grind Ends)

snap(-40,-40,-40)
sky(0,0,0)
fog(180,40,240)
ground(40,40,140)
polys(255,255,0)
fadefrom(7000)
density(10)
nlaps(7)
lightson()


set(47,0,0,0)
set(10,0,5600,0)p
set(14,0,10150,0)
chk(40,1750,10150,90)
set(14,3500,10150,-90)pt
set(14,3500,6650,90)
chk(40,5250,6650,90)
set(14,7000,6650,180)pt
set(10,7000,11200,180)
set(10,7000,16800,0)p
set(14,7000,21350,0)
chk(40,8750,21350,90)
set(14,10500,21350,-90)pt
set(14,10500,17850,90)
chk(40,12250,17850,90)
set(14,14000,17850,180)pt
set(10,14000,22400,180)
set(10,14000,28000,0)p
set(14,14000,32550,0)
chk(40,15750,32550,90)
set(14,17500,32550,-90)pt
set(14,17500,29050,90)
chk(40,19250,29050,90)
set(14,21000,29050,180)pt
set(10,21000,33600,180)
set(10,21000,39200,0)p
set(14,21000,43750,0)
chk(40,22750,43750,90)
set(14,24500,43750,-90)pt
set(14,24500,40250,90)
chk(40,26250,40250,90)
set(14,28000,40250,180)pt
set(10,28000,44800,180)p
set(10,28000,50400,180)p
set(14,28000,54950,0)
chk(40,29750,54950,90)
set(14,31500,54950,-90)pt
set(10,31500,50400,0)
set(10,31500,44800,180)
set(26,31500,47600,180)pr
set(10,31500,39200,180)p
set(14,31500,34650,180)
chk(40,29750,34650,90)
set(14,28000,34650,90)pt
set(14,28000,38150,-90)
chk(40,26250,38150,90)
set(14,24500,38150,0)pt
set(10,24500,33600,0)
set(32,24150,33848,180)
set(32,21350,34760,0)pr
set(10,24500,28000,180)p
set(14,24500,23450,180)
chk(40,22750,23450,90)
set(14,21000,23450,90)pt
set(14,21000,26950,-90)
chk(40,19250,26950,90)
set(14,17500,26950,0)pt
set(10,17500,22400,0)
set(32,14350,23000,0)
set(32,17150,22956,180)pr
set(10,17500,16800,180)p
set(14,17500,12250,180)
chk(40,15750,12250,90)
set(14,14000,12250,90)pt
set(14,14000,15750,-90)
chk(40,12250,15750,90)
set(14,10500,15750,0)pt
set(10,10500,11200,0)
set(32,10150,11104,180)
set(32,7350,11056,0)pr
set(10,10500,5600,180)p
set(14,10500,1050,180)
chk(40,8750,1050,90)
set(14,7000,1050,90)pt
set(14,7000,4550,-90)
chk(40,5250,4550,90)
set(14,3500,4550,0)pt
set(10,3500,0,0)p
set(10,3500,-5600,180)p
set(14,3500,-10150,180)
chk(40,1750,-10150,90)
set(14,0,-10150,90)pt
set(10,0,-5600,180)
set(26,0,-2976,0)pr

maxl(15,-3450,-11200)
maxb(8,-13600,-1050)
maxr(15,34950,-11200)
maxt(8,58400,-1050)
